author: szklaneczka
body:
**ICONOMI found management platform** is currently in ICO and you can still invest. 

That is most anticipated platform of 2016 why You may ask me. I will give you some graph and explanation. Solutions like ICONOMI are very popular in old economy people want be rich and wanted get more profit so they tried give money to people who know more about trading. Found management platforms preforms much better than average investors. Big guys just want invest not day trading. In crypto ICOMI will be 1st such project - such needed project.

Now true facts and everything that I show you, is now publicly available on web. Graphs taken from coinmarketcap.com are showing us, what is going on cryptocurrency markets right now:
![](http://i.imgur.com/FLe0WeF.jpg) 
![](http://i.imgur.com/s6Aeke2.jpg) 
![](http://i.imgur.com/RX0JK1z.jpg) 

You see on won eyes that: Bitcoin is loosing over time market share to other alt coins. There is many multiple reasons for that. Without ICONOMI getting on cryptocurrency board for new investors will be VERY hard. 
That is:
  
- choose right one coin. 
- skip scams 
- buy valuable coins 
-  crypto markets are getting bigger and bigger all time, there is about over 700coins tradable now


ICONOMI will be platform that for **every investor looking for big profits**. 
ICONOMI will give us 2 founds:

- **The ICONOMI.INDEX FUND** - a "Passive" - Coin Traded Fund (CTF). This fund operates on special rules, variables that manage the fund through automation. This Found will be the fastest available to investors at launch in Q4 2016 - The ICONOMI.PERFORMANCE FUND - an "
Active"
- **Coin Managed Fund (CMF)**, Operated by and managed by best investors. This fund will be invitation only available. If you invest in ICO you will get you invitation for free. I bet is worth its price. Those found will be carefully managed by ICONOMI experts and will provide best profits available.

Graphs shows that volume of alt coins is rising heavily and will move up. Without ICONOMI founds many investors will probably lose cash on market, while rypto currency market will rise as whole. **If buy some ICO shares you will get dividends forever as share holder.**
 Soon real professional traders will come to cryptocurrency and you as investor in order to get big profits will have to use service of ICONOMI. 

Personally I have invested in ICO and believe that **ICONOMI is future of crypto trading**. Don't miss a chance and invest here:[ico.iconomi.net](ico.iconomi.net) 

If you want invest in ICO: ![](http://i.imgur.com/iqDpTag.png)
